scripts.test: lab -l -r console -o stdout -r html -o build/report/coverage.html -r lcov -o build/report/lcov.info
scripts.package: pushd build/tmp && cp -rf ../../package.json ../../src/* . && npm i --production && zip -r -1 ../skill.zip * && popd
scripts.update: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name wasserstandinfo --region eu-west-1 --zip-file fileb://build/skill.zip
scripts.publish: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name wasserstandinfo --region eu-west-1 --zip-file fileb://build/skill.zip --publish
scripts.invoke: aws lambda invoke --function-name wasserstandinfo --region eu-west-1 --payload file://test/testevent.json out.json
scripts.create.alias: aws lambda create-alias --name PROD --function-name wasserstandinfo --region eu-west-1 --function-version 1
scripts.update.alias: aws lambda update-alias --name PROD --function-name wasserstandinfo --region eu-west-1 --function-version 1
scripts.invoke.alias: aws lambda invoke --function-name wasserstandinfo:PROD --region eu-west-1 --payload file://test/testevent.json out.json
